content:
Yeah, I've definitely noticed an improvement in my playing since getting the Champion 20. The amp's tone is really warm and responsive, and it's helped me develop a more dynamic sound. I've also been experimenting with different effects pedals and techniques, which has opened up new possibilities for my music.

As for coming back to playing acoustic guitar, I think I will eventually. I've just been really enjoying the process of learning and improving on electric guitar, and I feel like I still have a lot to explore. But I do miss playing acoustic sometimes, and I'm sure I'll pick it up again when the mood strikes me. Maybe I'll even try playing some acoustic versions of the songs I've been working on with my electric guitar!
